The bottom navigation bar allows movement between the primary functions in the app. \n\nIt is split into 3 tabs - Feed, Photo and Settings (from left to right).

The Feed tab allows automatic as well as manual topping-up of food and water. \n\nThe right column displays information about the previous top-up of water, the amount of water left, and allows the top-up of water through the \"Feed Me Water!\" button.
Automatic top-up of food and water can be enabled or disabled by simply toggling the switch-button on or off. \n\nAutomatic top-up will occur when the food/water level is low.

The food card displays information about the amount of food left and the previous top-up of food. \n\nThe \"TOP-UP FOOD!\" button at the top right corner also allows manual topping-up of food. The top-up does not take place if the food amount is full.

The water card displays information about the amount of water left and the previous top-up of water. \n\nThe \"TOP-UP WATER!\" button at the top right corner also allows manual topping-up of water. The top-up does not take place if the food amount is full.

The Photo tab allows you to take a picture of your hamster at any point of time to see how it is doing. 

Simply do so through the round button with a camera icon. 

Unstable internet connection may cause the photo to take a longer time to load. If you see the loading progress circle, please be patient.
The Settings tab allows you to set your hamster\'s name and/or profile picture here. \n\nClick the green round button with a tick to confirm changes for both name and profile picture.
Key in the name that you wish to set your hamster\'s name to. \n\nDon\'t forget to click on the green round button with a tick icon at the bottom to save your changes!

A preview of your hamster's profile picture is displayed here. 

Click on the blue round button with an arrow icon to choose an image. 

Once you've chosen an image, your hamster's tentative profile picture will be displayed here. 

Don't forget to click on the green round button with a tick icon at the bottom to save your changes!

You can choose 4 ways to upload an image: 
	1. Use our default hamster profile picture 
	2. Upload an image from your phone gallery 
	3. Take a photo with your phone camera 
	4. Use the latest HamsterCare photo taken in the 
			Photo Tab
